## ORDERED\_LIST\_MARKER\_KINDS variable

Read-only array that contains ordered list marker styles

**Signature:**

```typescript
ORDERED_LIST_MARKER_KINDS: readonly ["ordered", "decimal", "lower-alpha", "upper-alpha", "lower-roman", "upper-roman"]
```
